segment.source: User State Migration Tool (USMT) Command-line Syntax
segment.target: User State Migration Tool (USMT) Command-line Syntax

segment.source: The User State Migration Tool (USMT) 10.0 migrates user files and settings during large deployments of Windows.
segment.target: The User State Migration Tool (USMT) 10.0 migrates user files and settings during large deployments of Windows.

segment.source: To improve and simplify the migration process, USMT captures desktop, network, and application settings in addition to a user's files.
segment.target: To improve and simplify the migration process, USMT captures desktop, network, and application settings in addition to a user's files.

segment.source: USMT then migrates these items to a new Windows installation.
segment.target: USMT then migrates these items to a new Windows installation.
